short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark your important/fav chats for quick access

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fav AI Chat is a free extension to mark your ChatGPT chats as favorites for quick access without leaving your browser

You can favorite your chats by clicking on the heart icon which appears on the chats in sidebar in ChatGPT which are instantly visible in the sidebar to the right which is collapsible, so you can use it whenever you want

You can mark unlimited number of chats for free.
